column2: 18.3.2 Flightdeck Do or & Access System▲: The flightdeck door access system check must be accomplished prior?
column3: The flightdeck door access system check must be accomplished prior to the First Aircraft Flight of the day.
column5: Ch 18 §18.3.2 Flightdeck Do or & Access System▲

column2: 18.3.2 Flightdeck Do or & Access System▲: Normal access to the flightdeck will be accomplished as specified?
column3: Normal access to the flightdeck will be accomplished as specified under Normal Procedures. Use of the access code is considered an emergency access request (except, prior to departure, when flightdeck crew may be required to enter access code to gain entry to the flightdeck).
column5: Ch 18 §18.3.2 Flightdeck Do or & Access System▲

column2: 18.3.2 Flightdeck Do or & Access System▲: If the DC Bus 2 is unpowered, place the POWER?
column3: If the DC Bus 2 is unpowered, place the POWER CUTOFF Switch in OFF, and use the deadbolt in the LOCKED KEY INOPERABLE position to lock the door.
column5: Ch 18 §18.3.2 Flightdeck Do or & Access System▲
